price: 17. Deux (Anges) chargés de recueillir (ses œuvres) les recueillent, assis l’un à gauche et l’autre à droite.
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
